title: Geelong v Hawthorn: AFL 2025 first preliminary final – live
summary: The Cats and Hawks face off at the MCG for a chance to secure a spot in the grand final. Martin Pegan provides goal-by-goal updates on the exhilarating match. Fans eagerly await the outcome of this crucial encounter.

title: World Athletics Championships 2025: 200m finals, heptathlon and more – live
summary: Yara El-Shaboury provides updates on the seventh night of events in Tokyo. Highlights include the men's and women's 200m finals. Stay tuned for more exciting performances and results.

title: Donald Trump suggests broadcasters could be punished over critical coverage amid Kimmel suspension – US politics live
summary: The president criticized major US networks, claiming they were "97% against me." He expressed support for ABC's decision to suspend Jimmy Kimmel's show. The remarks highlight his ongoing tensions with the media landscape.

title: Maresca short on Sterling sympathy, Arsenal make boardroom reshuffle: football – live
summary: Join our writers for the latest news updates, previews, and insights as we approach the weekend. Stay informed with engaging commentary and analysis. Don’t miss out on what’s happening!

title: Pound slides after UK government borrowing jumps in August and insolvencies rise – business live
summary: In August, borrowing reached its highest level since 2020, reflecting increased consumer demand and economic activity. This surge in borrowing may signal greater confidence among consumers despite ongoing economic challenges. Analysts are closely monitoring these trends to assess their impact on future economic growth.
